item.description:
October Meetup- Bring a Canned Food Item for the RI Food Bank

We will be collecting non-perishable food to be donated to the RI Food Bank. With the upcoming holiday season approching the RI Food Bank needs as much help as they can get. So please help them out and bring something to the next meetup. Thanks!!


Meet-up with other local atheists for some food, drink and great disucssion. We meet in the Function Room in the back of the restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: We Meet in the Private Function Room
item.name: Rhode Island Atheist Society October Meetup and Food Drive
